A simple random sample based on the company registry of the Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH). Criteria for inclusion in the basic population from which the sample was drawn: 1. the company operates in the processing, building industry, or commerce 2. at the end of 1997 it had more than 20 employees 3. the net return from sales in 1996 was more than 250 million forints. Out of the 2900 posted questionnaires, 451 was completed.
Posted self-administered questionnaire and interview by telephone.
